job_history.work_description: Providing administrative support to President of home-care service provider to the Developmentally Disable population. Maintain calendar, process requisitions, and organize company meetings. Administer pre-employment training and testing. Mange bi-weekly payroll for 100 employees Maintain schedules and calendar management for President. Maintain organization charts, staffing/workforce plans, HR audit files and other confidential materials. Coordinate with Recruiting and Staffing to process new hires. Handle all administrative support responsibilities related to HR.

Processed incoming and outgoing shipments. Analyzed customer billing issues for corrective actions. Provided assistance to dock personnel and suppliers on shortages and overages. Assisted in special projects as needed.

Responsible for assisting the Director of Engineering, VP of Construction, HS&E Director and Human Resource Business Partner. Maintain documentation control for construction projects, new hire and safety training, purchasing activities, ensuring payment of all site utilities, and support accountant on account payable issues.

Reviewed applications, letters, close outs, and cancellation policies. Advised clients on policy documentation, correspondence, cancellations, deletions, and additions. Prepared, review, rate, and issue renewals and new business policies. Maintained and developed quality control procedures for finance contracts Developed and implemented automated monitoring systems.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled bi-weekly payroll for 100 employees as an Executive Assistant HR, indicating strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: HR Administration
skills.explanation: Provided administrative support to HR, including pre-employment training, testing, and maintaining HR audit files, showing strong proficiency in HR administration.

skills.name: Administrative Support
skills.explanation: Over 20 years of experience providing administrative support in various roles, including Executive Assistant HR, Administrative Assistant, and Biller, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Maintained calendars and schedules for executives and managed multiple administrative tasks, suggesting strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Organizational Management
skills.explanation: Maintained organization charts, staffing plans, and confidential materials, indicating strong proficiency in organizational management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided assistance to customers and suppliers on billing issues and shortages, showing a solid working proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed customer billing issues for corrective actions, but limited information is available to determine the extent of data analysis experience.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Assisted in special projects as needed, but limited information is available to determine the extent of project management experience.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided administrative support to executives, but limited information is available to determine the extent of leadership experience.
